languages.text: "Сдаюсь. Не надо со мной ничего делать". {n}На лице солдата, впрочем, написан отнюдь не страх, а скорее облегчение. Бросив по сторонам заговорщицкий взгляд, он тихо произносит:{/n} "Совсем никому, ладно? А то господин губернатор меня не помилует".

"I give up. No need to do anything to me." {n}He does not look frightened, however — relieved is more like it. He glances around with a conspiratorial look and whispers,{/n} "Please don't tell anyone, all right? Or the governor will make sure I'm punished."
languages.original_text: "Сдаюсь. Не надо со мной ничего делать". {n}На лице солдата, впрочем, написан отнюдь не страх, а скорее облегчение. Бросив по сторонам заговорщицкий взгляд, он тихо произносит:{/n} "Совсем никому, ладно? А то господин губернатор меня не помилует".

traits.locale_text: "I give up. No need to do anything to me." {n}He does not look frightened, however — relieved is more like it. He glances around with a conspiratorial look and says quietly,{/n} "Please don't tell anyone, all right? Or the governor will make sure I get it."

"I give up. No need to do anything to me." {n}He does not look frightened, however — relieved is more like it. He glances around with a conspiratorial look and says quietly,{/n} "Please don't tell anyone, all right? Or the governor will make sure I get it."

"I give up. No need to do anything to me." {n}He does not look frightened, however — relieved is more like it. He glances around with a conspiratorial look and whispers,{/n} "Please don't tell anyone, all right? Or the governor will make sure I get punished."

"I give up. No need to do anything to me." {n}He does not look frightened, however — relieved is more like it. He glances around with a conspiratorial look and whispers,{/n} "Please don't tell anyone, all right? Or the governor will make sure I get punished."

"I give up. No need to do anything to me." {n}He does not look frightened, however — relieved is more like it. He glances around with a conspiratorial look and whispers,{/n} "Please don't tell anyone, all right? Or the governor will make sure I'm punished."

"I give up. No need to do anything to me." {n}He does not look frightened, however — relieved is more like it. He glances around with a conspiratorial look and whispers,{/n} "Please don't tell anyone, all right? Or the governor will make sure I'm punished."

languages.text: "Ich gebe auf. Ihr müsst mir nichts antun." {n}Er sieht aber nicht verängstigt aus — eher erleichtert. Er blickt sich verschwörerisch um und flüstert:{/n} "Bitte sagt niemandem etwas davon, ja? Sonst sorgt der Gouverneur dafür, dass ich bestraft werde."
languages.original_text: "I give up. No need to do anything to me." {n}He does not look frightened, however — relieved is more like it. He glances around with a conspiratorial look and whispers,{/n} "Please don't tell anyone, all right? Or the governor will make sure I'm punished."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gebe auf. Ihr müsst mir nichts antun." {n}Er sieht aber nicht verängstigt aus — eher erleichtert. Er blickt sich verschwörerisch um und flüstert:{/n} "Bitte sagt niemandem etwas davon, ja? Sonst sorgt der Gouverneur dafür, dass ich bestraft werde."

languages.text: « Très bien, j'abandonne. Inutile de me faire du mal... » {n}Il ne semble pas terrifié le moins du monde, il a même l'air soulagé. Il lance un regard conspirateur autour de lui, puis vous murmure :{/n} « Ne le répétez à personne, sans quoi le gouverneur s'assurera de me punir. »
languages.original_text: "I give up. No need to do anything to me." {n}He does not look frightened, however — relieved is more like it. He glances around with a conspiratorial look and whispers,{/n} "Please don't tell anyone, all right? Or the governor will make sure I'm punished."

traits.locale_text: « Très bien, j'abandonne. Inutile de me faire du mal... » {n}Il ne semble pas terrifié le moins du monde, il a même l'air soulagé. Il lance un regard conspirateur autour de lui, puis vous murmure :{/n} « Ne le répétez à personne, sans quoi le gouverneur s'assurera de me punir. »

languages.text: “我投降，您没必要对我动手。”{n}不过，他的表情看起来并不害怕，反而更像是松了口气。他鬼鬼祟祟地环顾四周，小声开了口。{/n}“请不要告诉任何人，好吗？否则总督会惩罚我的。”
languages.original_text: "I give up. No need to do anything to me." {n}He does not look frightened, however — relieved is more like it. He glances around with a conspiratorial look and whispers,{/n} "Please don't tell anyone, all right? Or the governor will make sure I'm punished."

traits.locale_text: “我投降，您没必要对我动手。”{n}不过，他的表情看起来并不害怕，反而更像是松了口气。他鬼鬼祟祟地环顾四周，小声开了口。{/n}“请不要告诉任何人，好吗？否则总督会惩罚我的。”

languages.text: 「降参です。もう僕に何もする必要はありませんよ」{n}青年は怯えていない…むしろ安堵している様子だ。共犯者めいた視線で周囲を見回してからささやく。{/n}「誰にも話さないでください。いいですね？バレたら総督は僕を処罰するに違いないんですから」
languages.original_text: "I give up. No need to do anything to me." {n}He does not look frightened, however — relieved is more like it. He glances around with a conspiratorial look and whispers,{/n} "Please don't tell anyone, all right? Or the governor will make sure I'm punished."

traits.locale_text: 「降参です。もう僕に何もする必要はありませんよ」{n}青年は怯えていない…むしろ安堵している様子だ。共犯者めいた視線で周囲を見回してからささやく。{/n}「誰にも話さないでください。いいですね？バレたら総督は僕を処罰するに違いないんですから」

languages.text: «Me rindo. No hace falta que me haga nada». {n}Sin embargo, no parece asustado, sino más bien aliviado. Mira a su alrededor con cara de circunstancias y susurra,{/n} «Por favor, no se lo diga a nadie, ¿vale? O el gobernador se asegurará de que me castiguen».
languages.original_text: "I give up. No need to do anything to me." {n}He does not look frightened, however — relieved is more like it. He glances around with a conspiratorial look and whispers,{/n} "Please don't tell anyone, all right? Or the governor will make sure I'm punished."

traits.locale_text: «Me rindo. No hace falta que me haga nada». {n}Sin embargo, no parece asustado, sino más bien aliviado. Mira a su alrededor con cara de circunstancias y susurra,{/n} «Por favor, no se lo diga a nadie, ¿vale? O el gobernador se asegurará de que me castiguen».

languages.text: "Pes ediyorum, işkence etmenize gerek yok." {n}Gerçi korkmuş değil de rahatlamış gibi görünüyor. Entrika çevirir gibi etrafına bakıp fısıldıyor.{/n} "Ama lütfen kimseye söylemeyin olur mu? Yoksa vali canıma okur."
languages.original_text: "I give up. No need to do anything to me." {n}He does not look frightened, however — relieved is more like it. He glances around with a conspiratorial look and whispers,{/n} "Please don't tell anyone, all right? Or the governor will make sure I'm punished."

traits.locale_text: "Pes ediyorum, işkence etmenize gerek yok." {n}Gerçi korkmuş değil de rahatlamış gibi görünüyor. Entrika çevirir gibi etrafına bakıyor ve şöyle fısıldıyor:{/n} "Ama lütfen kimseye söylemeyin olur mu? Yoksa vali canıma okur."
